##Reproducibility

Steps of data analysis:
  -Define the question
  -Define the ideal data set
  -Determine what data you can access
  -Obtain the data
  -Clean the Data
  -Exploratory data analysis
  -Statistical prediction/Modeling
  -Interpret results
  -Challenge  results
  -Synthesize/Write up results
  -Create reproducible code
